name: HELM Adapter
content:
# Helm Adapter

**Guidelines**
- Sane chart structure; values via `values.yaml`; document required values; do not commit secrets; prefer templates that are explicit and minimal.

**Validate/Templates**
```
helm lint ./charts/<name>
helm template ./charts/<name> --debug --dry-run
```

**Schema / Kube Validation**
- Use values schema (`values.schema.json`) and/or kubeconform if present.

**References**
- Helm Docs — https://helm.sh/docs/
- Kubeconform — https://github.com/yannh/kubeconform
